thread.title: BRIEF-FDA's Gottlieb Says Saw Reduced Effectiveness Of Influenza Vaccines Against H3N2

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FDA's Gottlieb Says Saw Reduced Effectiveness Of Influenza Vaccines Against H3N2

organizations.name: gottlieb says saw reduced effectiveness of influenza vaccines against h3n2
reuters) - u.s. food and drug administration

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - U.S. Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Scott Gottlieb:
* STATEMENT FROM FDA COMMISSIONER SCOTT GOTTLIEB, M.D., ON FDA‘S ONGOING EFFORTS TO HELP IMPROVE EFFECTIVENESS OF INFLUENZA VACCINES
* FDA‘S GOTTLIEB SAYS FDA SAW REDUCED EFFECTIVENESS OF THIS YEAR‘S INFLUENZA VACCINES AGAINST INFLUENZA A STRAIN H3N2 Source text for Eikon:
